desc: Physics 127, the second course in the three-semester calculus based sequence, explores special relativity, waves, atomic physics, heat, and thermodynamics. There is one 2.5-hour laboratory meeting per week. Prerequisites: Physics 126 or permission of instructor, and concurrent registration in (or previous completion of) Mathematics 126 or 128. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Analytical II
notes: Students in Physics 127 must also register for one lab Physics 127 AL or BL.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Physics 126 or permission of instructor, and concurrent registration in (or previous completion of) Mathematics 126 or 128. Offered Spring Semester.
title: Analytical Physics II
